data.eml:eml: Chevreuxiopsisfranki gen. n., sp. n. (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Thoriellidae) from the deep sea southwest of Tasmania

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Halfter, Svenja, Oliver Coleman, Charles (2019): Chevreuxiopsisfranki gen. n., sp. n. (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Thoriellidae) from the deep sea southwest of Tasmania. Zoosystematics and Evolution 95 (1): 125-132, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.95.32548, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.95.32548
